An offline example form

You've loaded the page, congratulations! This is a demonstration of an offline form using sessionStorage for data, and a serviceworker and Cache Storage for the page files.

  • fill in some fields
  • turn off your network connection (wifi and wired)
  • reload the page

Expected behavior: The page changes to indicate you are working in offline mode, and the page loads with the entered data in the fields.

The exception is the credit card field. This is to note that sessionStorage, while ephemeral, is suseptible to cross site scripting, and should never be used to store sensitive data.
